description: Details of enhanced sound insulation for floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas pursuant to condition 6 of planning permission ref: 244347FUL dated 27/02/2025 for: Conversion Of Ground Floor Flat Into 2 Self-Contained Flats, Conversion Of 1st Floor Flat Into 2 Self-Contained Flats and Associated Alterations To Amenity Space And Boundary Treatment; Internal Alterations To The Existing Flats; Single Storey, Part Two Storey; Rear And Side Extension Following Demolition Of Existing Rear Addition; Part Rear Roof Extension To Rear Outrigger Roof Slope; Single Storey Detached Garden Outbuilding For Ancillary Use For Flat 2
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
